description: A column exploring crime in New York City, from murders to pickpockets and scam artists, and the characters on both sides of the law.
title: New York
title_page: New York - The New York Times
text:
Image
Four Decades Later, Teenage Killer Is Paroled, and Deported
Dempsey Hawkins was rejected for parole many times. In August he was told yes — but only if he was sent to England, where he hadn’t lived since he was 6.
